chapters.title: Meeting Dronacharya
chapters.description: Ekalavya approaches Dronacharya to learn archery but is rejected due to his caste.

chapters.title: Self-Taught Mastery
chapters.description: Ekalavya practices diligently and becomes an exceptional archer, creating a statue of Dronacharya as his teacher.

chapters.title: Recognition and Test
chapters.description: Ekalavya demonstrates his skills, astonishing Dronacharya and the Pandavas.

chapters.title: The Guru Dakshina
chapters.description: Dronacharya asks for Ekalavya's thumb as a teacher's fee, which he willingly sacrifices.
